title: [Mistydeep, South of Ravelin]
description: A raucous raven call reverberates through the treetops, its point of origin hard to discern.  Directly southeast, a large island splits the flow of the Mistydeep River.  The western branch runs wide, swift, and deep while its other half progresses at a more leisurely pace, skimming small sandy shoals.  On both sides, clear pebbled basins provide hiding places for crafty fish at the river's bottom.  Far above, a dark granite tor rises sharply from the island's heavily-wooded heart.
paths: Obvious paths: north, northeast, east, south, northwest, down
room.location: the northern reaches of the Mistydeep River
